SELECT AC.AccountID AS "AccountID" , AC.CompanyCode AS "CompanyCode" , FN_GETACTBASECODENAME('CompanyCode',AC.CompanyCode,#{companyCode}) AS "CompanyName" , AC.AccountCode AS "AccountCode" , AC.AccountName AS "AccountName" , AC.AccountShortName AS "AccountShortName" , FN_GETACTBASECODENAME('AccountClass',AC.AccountClass,#{companyCode}) AS "AccountClassName" , AC.IsUse AS "IsUse" , TO_CHAR(AC.RegistDate, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS "RegistDate" FROM act_account AC WHERE 1=1
AND AC.CompanyCode = #{companyCode}
AND AC.AccountClass = #{accountClass}
AND AC.IsUse = #{isUse}
AND ( AC.AccountCode LIKE '%' || #{searchStr} || '%' OR AC.AccountName LIKE '%' || #{searchStr} || '%' OR AC.AccountShortName LIKE '%' || #{searchStr} || '%' )
AND AC.AccountCode LIKE '%' || #{searchStr} || '%'
AND AC.AccountName LIKE '%' || #{searchStr} || '%'
AND AC.AccountShortName LIKE '%' || #{searchStr} || '%'
,AC.AccountID DESC
,
"CompanyName" "AccountCode" "AccountName" "AccountShortName" "AccountClassName" "IsUse" "RegistDate"
ASC DESC
